Articles.Content:
Members of the old KSP roleplay(Not in response to its deletion, however) created an alternative that allowed technology not allowed in the previous roleplay. It has a fairly similar, but more complicated(Due to complications) system, is connected to Kerbin but no longer takes place on Kerbin, and is much more open and free to war and discussion, as the members that created it felt more freedom and less admin interference was required. We still need to clamp down sometimes, however.

We have live, animated battles simulated in Battleships Forever(A free game where you can customize ships and put them in battle), recorded, and posted onto youtube so you can view your battles as if watching from a probe nearby.

Currently unorganized as the preboot RP was, but you can help to organize it but PMing your suggestions to admins. Please try not to be angry at us however, as we are very stressed over the amount of work we are expected to do in a short time.

[http://ksprp.forumotion.com/](http://ksprp.forumotion.com/)

Please give feedback and suggestions.
I\'m not sure you have permission to use that big KSP header.

Which forum type are you guys using?

I plan to make one myself, and am interested in Invision, but I want to hear your ideas.

> 
> Which forum type are you guys using?
> 
> I plan to make one myself, and am interested in Invision, but I want to hear your ideas.

Don\'t, forumotion is the best.

> 
> Don\'t, forumotion is the best.

I\'m using forumotion, I just don\'t know which version to use.

I\'d like to echo Ascensiam\'s statement, you shouldn\'t be using that logo like that on the masthead. It\'s okay if you have it in the corner, but the way you have it now it\'s giving some implications that you aren\'t authorized to use.

I\'d also add a disclaimer at the bottom like the one on my Kerbal Comics site. I had to place that there to satisfy Squad so I could have permission to use their IP.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
I\'ll notify the person running the site when I am able.

I\'ll get right to it.

EDIT - Disclaimer created at the top, made logo smaller. We\'ll upload our own logo alongside with it once we finish it up.

> 
> I\'ll get right to it.
> 
> EDIT - Disclaimer created at the top, made logo smaller. We\'ll upload our own logo alongside with it once we finish it up.

You should also say in the disclaimer that the logo and the game are copyrighted by Squad, INC...

it seems the forum has died

this ain\'t helping me find a new roleplay forum to set up shop in

> 
> it seems the forum has died
> 
> this ain\'t helping me find a new roleplay forum to set up shop in

We\'ve managed to stay relatively stable in my RP forum,

krp.net78.net

However, at the moment I\'m trying to get my host so I can chew them out for suspending my account for email, of all things. It should be back up in around 24 hours.
It is krp.net78.net, Radion

> 
> It is krp.net78.net, Radion

Woops, sorry. It seems that host has annoyed me to the point of forgetting the name of my site. Still no answer.

> 
> Woops, sorry. It seems that host has annoyed me to the point of forgetting the name of my site. Still no answer.

Dear (Insert name here)

Today, at (Time Here), I received 15+ emails from the site, talking about the forum. From this, this then resulted in the holding of my account privileges\' which include the running of my site. Considering this may be a problem on your end, please respond as soon as you can.

From,

(insert name here)

That would be the base of an email I would do.
This forum doesn\'t seem to be especially active, you know...

Attention there is a new forum founded for those who can\'t do the test. You must all be approved by me, before proceeding. I can accept what some people may say to change.

URL: [http://ksproleplay.freeforums.org/index.php?sid=adbfede46cc8f0d850130cbe8c99dac8](http://ksproleplay.freeforums.org/index.php?sid=adbfede46cc8f0d850130cbe8c99dac8)

from looking at this fourm i see no test

is this a non test or have you forgoten to add one?

> 
> from looking at this fourm i see no test
> 
> is this a non test or have you forgoten to add one?

This is a non-test. However, this will include elements from Radion\'s RP, which do include realistic wars, and GM units. And if there is Godmodding, there will be punishments.

> 
> This is a non-test. However, this will include elements from Radion\'s RP, which do include realistic wars, and GM units. And if there is Godmodding, there will be punishments.
